title: Spicy-Adventure Stories v12n02 [1940-07] (-ifc, ibc, bc, pages1 & 2) {jvh-sas}
description: Note: The copy of the magazine which was scanned was missing the inside front cover, inside back cover, back cover, and Pages 1 & 2. CONTENTS: Spicy-Adventure Stories [v 12 #2, July 1940] (Culture Publications, Inc., pulp, cover by H. J. Court [pseudonym of Robert Leslie Bellem] · ss
